Assistant professor at the [Faculty of Medicine of University of Porto](https://med.up.pt), teaching and researching digital health, medical informatics, and AI in healthcare.

Human, dad, husband, Portuguese-made European, living in northern Portugal with an amazing wife, two awesome kids, and two ok cats.
